name: Memento Mori, Hazel
description:
Memento Mori, Hazel is a visual novel made in twine. The game was made for DreamCatcherOCT. It's set in a dreamworld where beings from across different worlds have been trapped. Her dream is coming to an end and reality is finally catching up with her. This is the 5th game in the series.

Features:

4 Main Routes

2 Major Endings

Multiple Minor Endings

Transgender Protagonist

Approximately 200 unique images (I lost count, this is an estimate.)
